message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to your business.  While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,500,000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,250,000, a price that reflects its value and leaves room for substantial profit on your end. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know your decision as soon as possible.
